'''/debugmobspawning''' is a command that can be enabled with the [[debug property]] <code>-DMC_DEBUG_DEV_COMMANDS</code>. It attempts to spawn mobs of the specified spawn group at the specified destination.

== Syntax ==
<code>debugmobspawning <''spawn group''> <at></code>
: Forces a spawn attempt for the specified spawn group at the specified block position. Mobs only spawn if the spawn attempt succeeds, according to the rules described in {{slink|Mob spawning|Spawn cycle}}.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|''spawn group''}}
: Specifies the spawn group to force a spawn attempt for.
: Must be one of {{cd|ambient}}, {{cd|axolotls}}, {{cd|creature}}, {{cd|misc}}, {{cd|monster}}, {{cd|underground_water_creature}}, {{cd|water_ambient}}, or {{cd|water_creature}}.
{{argument|at|block_pos}}
: Specifies the position to force the spawn attempt on.
: {{arg desc|je=block_pos}}
